sections.summary: The Aurora mission launches in 2035 with a crew of four scientists bound for Mars orbit.
sections.objectives: Study polar ice deposits and deploy long-duration satellites.

sections.summary: Claimscope is an evaluation harness founded in 2024 to reproduce AI lab claims with pinned datasets and open tooling.
sections.history: Founded in 2024 to promote transparent regression testing.

sections.summary: Recent rover readings confirm basaltic craters contain ice crystals peaking at dawn.
sections.details: The crystals sublimate under direct sunlight but persist in shadowed ridges.
